channel.title: newbie question about qubes
channel.description:
hi there, i'm new to using qubes n whonix and was wondering if there was a way to either add i2p or combine my whonix tor connection that everything now goes through with my vpn ?
cheers

item.title: newbie question about qubes
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

The current solution needs to be applied on the Workstation. Regarding how to launch the terminal, simply launch it via the App Launcher.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: newbie question about qubes
item.dc:creator: metalrebel83
item.description:
first of all thanx for the reply.whats actually confusing me is which terminal do I type the i2p install stuff into in qubes? I’ve installed in whonix workstation in Windows before but never using qubes u see

Read full topic

item.title: newbie question about qubes
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Regarding VPN’s, consider this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnel_Tor_through_proxy_or_VPN_or_SSH regarding I2P this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/I2P

Have a nice day,

Ego
